subject: Relationships
title: Triangulation: Using Others as Weapons
description: A quick, practical guide to Triangulation: Using Others as Weapons.

hook.text: 'My ex would never have complained about this.' They bring a third person into your conflict to make you feel small.

buildup.text: Triangulation is introducing a third party into the relationship dynamic to manipulate, control, or create jealousy.

discovery.text: It can be an ex, a friend, a parent, or even a child â€” anyone who can be used to shift the power balance.

twist.text: Triangulation makes the victim compete for the abuser's attention. The prize isn't love â€” it's just less pain.

climax.text: Healthy relationships are between two people. When a third is brought in as leverage, someone is being manipulated.

punchline.text: Triangulation turns love into a competition. The only move is not to play.

quiz.question: What is triangulation in toxic relationships?
options: Using a third party to manipulate and control
